column1: Be careful Bruce Vilanch! There are superhumans fighting right over there!
Your teacher was caught buying a KitchenAid Stand Mixer at Bed Bath & Beyond!
By all reports, the young Jew is not letting up! He is still going around convincing people to have faith in the Economy by shopping!
Nonsense! Mel Gibson is a smart and spiritual man! There's nothing anti-Semitic about it!
Hey. He's right. If we build for a better future, the immigrants will stay there.
It's right behind us!  It's coming the other way!
